silent.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The crowd fell silent (=became silent) when the president appeared.

silent.translation[0].definitions[1].def: not talking much to other people
silent.translation[0].definitions[1].not: the strong silent type (=a man who looks strong and does not talk very much)
silent.translation[0].definitions[2].def: failing or refusing to talk about something or express an opinion
silent.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The report was silent on the subject.
silent.translation[0].definitions[3].def: without any sound, or not making any sound
silent.translation[0].definitions[3].not: as silent as the grave (=completely silent in a mysterious or uncomfortable way)
silent.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: The large house was silent and lonely.

silent.translation[0].definitions[4].def: a silent film has pictures but no sound
silent.translation[0].definitions[5].def: a silent letter in a word is not pronounced
